plentry.pd: Number of beats per measure, range [1,9]. Default is 4, meaning 1 strong beat and 3 weak beats per measure.
Tempo (beats per minute), range [60,360]. Default is 60, meaning 60 beats per minute.

Tempo (beats per minute), range [60,360]. Default is 60, i.e., 60 beats per minute.
